original_data.name: Travis Taylor
posts: Hi! I'm Travis, currently based in Atlanta, GA. I previously lived in Chicago and studied math at the University of Illinois. I like hiking and writing, plus I've gotten into running and photography recently. I'm in the OMSCS program taking AI courses and working in data science. #connectme
